title: DATS data standard schema
description: A format, reporting guideline, terminology. It is used to indicate whether the dataset conforms to a particular community norm or specification.

type.description: a descriptor (ideally from a controlled vocabulary) providing information about the nature of the information resource

licenses.description: a property used to specify to the terms of use of the standard

version.description: an optional property used to specify a release point for the repository when applicable
